A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was painful to watch\, a crass rehash of the Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi\, plot holes the size of the Death Star\, giving Princess Leia nothing to do but worry\, with time wasted on routine fight scenes while moments of potential depth were glossed over. I spent almost the whole time rolling my eyes. Don't believe the Tomatometer on this one. Everyone I know who has seen it wishes that they had not.
